parameters.name: Celt
parameters.description: Number of sketch segments for the sketch segments enumeration

parameters.name: Rgelt
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of sketch segments of size Celt

parameters.name: PceltFetched
parameters.description: Pointer to the number of sketch segments returned from the list; this value can be less than celt if you ask for more sketch segments than exist, or it can be NULL if no more sketch segments exist

title: IEnumSketchSegments.Next
description: Gets the next sketch segment in the sketch segments enumeration.
signature:
void Next( 
   System.Int32
Celt
,
   out SketchSegment
Rgelt
,
   out System.Int32
PceltFetched
)

parameters.name: Celt
parameters.description: Number of sketch segments for the sketch segments enumeration

parameters.name: Rgelt
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of sketch segments of size Celt

parameters.name: PceltFetched
parameters.description: Pointer to the number of sketch segments returned from the list; this value can be less than celt if you ask for more sketch segments than exist, or it can be NULL if no more sketch segments exist

remarks: For use in in-process DLLs only.
